meanings.definition: The act of arranging a timetable or plan for events or tasks.
meanings.sent1: Her scheduling of study time helped her stay organized for exams.
meanings.sent2: The scheduling of meetings was done efficiently by the secretary.
meanings.sent3: The scheduling of snack breaks made the workday more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: His scheduling of breaks was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The scheduling of the bus routes made commuting easier for everyone.

meanings.definition: The process of determining the timing and sequence of activities.
meanings.sent1: The scheduling of classes was crucial for students to plan their day.
meanings.sent2: Effective scheduling ensured that all tasks were completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The scheduling of nap times was a highlight for the daycare kids.
meanings.sent4: Her scheduling of practice sessions was like creating a musical masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The scheduling of flights was meticulous to avoid any delays.
